code: import React from"react";import{motion}from"framer-motion";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const titles=["Music Hub","Per-Vurt","Chicks A Lot","Fitness Zone","Dr Kafta","Multiverse","Volcano Karting","Wave Bike","Craving Pizza Guys","Serve Tennis Academy","Abajour Beirut","Humburg","Machrou3 Cafe","Munchease Diner","Dippers","Creative Ness","Club House","The Nook","Kibbe Kitchen","Beeway Scooter","Padel 961","Wingman","Cloudy Bites","Kurv Pilates","Bayt em Nazih","Sloppy Joes","Mob’s Burger","Crepaway","Appetito Beirut","Hayat Doner","Agonista","Beit Al Shawarma"];function BubbleAnimation(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"relative w-full h-screen overflow-hidden bg-gray-50",children:titles.map((title,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"absolute bg-[#5843aa] text-white flex items-center justify-center px-4 py-2 rounded-full shadow-lg font-medium",style:{width:"120px",height:"120px",top:"".concat(Math.random()*100,"%"),left:"".concat(Math.random()*100,"%")},animate:{x:[0,Math.random()*300-150],y:[0,Math.random()*300-150]},transition:{repeat:Infinity,repeatType:"reverse",duration:Math.random()*5+4},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center text-sm",children:title})},index))});}export default BubbleAnimation;
